tool_description: Google news , Bing news , BBC, CNN, Yahoo news ,MSN, CNN, New York Times, The Washington Post, Wall Street Journal, USA Today, Reuters, Fox News, HuffPost, NBC News, ABC News, India Today, BBC News ,The Guardian , Al Jazeera CNBC ,Associated Press ,Fox News ,Le Monde , Deutsche Welle ,China Central Television (CCTV) , ESPN, Bleacher NBA ,The Sydney Morning Herald,NHK World ,The Categories- Economist, Breaking News, World Events, Politics, Technology, Health, Science, Business, Crypto Stock Ma...
name: NewsNow
title: NewsNow

api_list.name: News API V2 (Powered By Google)
api_list.description:
To get news between 'from date' to 'To date' set 'time_bounded parameter true
Dates are in dd/mm/yyyy format
set 'time_bounded' false to get only latest news
Categories ( all categories are supported eg - finance, sports  and more , Can be removed)
Location - (  Use country codes such as uk, us, in , Can be removed )
Source  - (write domain name like 'Bloomber.com' etc , Remove this to dont use site filter)

for any queries and bug report contact at api.prlabs@gmail.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newsnow.p.rapidapi.com/newsv2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newsnow.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: NewsNow API: Real-time news aggregation and delivery service, providing developers and businesses with global news articles and headlines, offering extensive coverage, flexible querying, and easy integration.
